DOC.brief_summary: This study hypothesize supplementation omega-3 fatty acid ( OM3 ) increase physical activity , inhibit rapid gain body weight BMI sedentary normally active 8 year old child . The purpose secondarily explore patterns association OM3 supplementation , baseline follow-up level study parameter . The study also aim study basal level OM3 correlate physical activity study association basal level OM3 effect OM3 supplementation physical activity . To study effect OM3 supplementation triglyceride LDL cholesterol level study pronounced effect child high level . To study OM3 supplementation , compare placebo reduce weight increase among child risk become overweight . To study association effect OM3 physical activity , weight risk marker blood . To study gender difference .
DOC.brief_title: Study Omega-3 Fatty Acids Regarding Ergogenic , Anti-inflammatory Obesity Inhibitory Effects 8 Year Old Children
DOC.criteria: Children second grade Swedish primary school willing participate Any morbidity affect ambulatory physical activity , study blood parameter selfreport parameter ( i.e . perceive motor skill , quality life physical activity ) Knowing beforehand participant able complete intervention and/or 0 15 week assessments/clinics .
